nodes.text: Amzartho was a male Human Mandalorian who lived during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.
A human Mandalorian with blue armor, Amzartho lived on Tatooine during the Cold War. He lived in the city of Mos Ila, where he owned a small armor shop.

Amzartho appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Medium Armor Vendor for Imperial players on Tatooine. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, he was removed from the game along with the rest of the Medium Armor Vendors.
